scripts.build: mkdir -p dist generated && python3 render_index.py && python3 render_guides.py && python3 render_docs.py && postcss src/style.css -o dist/style.css && python3 replace_style_names.py && html-minifier --input-dir generated --output-dir dist --file-ext html --remove-comments --collapse-whitespace --minify-js true && cp -R src/static/. dist/static/
